name: It's Been A Long Road
description: In an attempt to bolster hearts throughout the galaxy, a refit NX-01 has been recommissioned to serve in a diplomatic capacity. But when the ship disappears from Archer Spacedock, it'll take a savvy captain to restore the galaxy's faith!
rules:
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Ship Battles in one Phase, and Supply Missions in another Phase.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battles and Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using C.O.P. Janeway, any version of Archer, Michael Burnham, Chapel, or inspiring crew will provide a bonus to Ship Battles and Supply Missions.
-- Using the NX-01 Refit, U.S.S. Yeager or Miranda Class ship will provide a hull bonus in Skirmish Battles.
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 2!
-- Every Ship Battle or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: C.O.P. Janeway, Archer, Michael Burnham, Chapel, or inspiring crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Jurati
featured_crew.flavor: In a covert mission to restore the timeline, Jurati takes center stage during a gala, but in her performance it becomes apparent that the Borg Queen has taken over.

featured_crew.name: Burnham
featured_crew.flavor: After over a century's absence Starfleet Academy rises again, and it’s now up to the new graduates to define the future of the Federation.

action.name: I Feel Like Anything is Possible

featured_crew.name: Chapel
featured_crew.flavor: When it comes to relationship advice, Christine Chapel is the friend you need. This doesn’t mean she’s good at her own relationships.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Jurati
rewards.flavor: In a covert mission to restore the timeline, Jurati takes center stage during a gala, but in her performance it becomes apparent that the Borg Queen has taken over.

rewards.name: Chapel
rewards.flavor: When it comes to relationship advice, Christine Chapel is the friend you need. This doesn’t mean she’s good at her own relationships.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Chapel

rewards.name: Burnham
rewards.flavor: After over a century's absence Starfleet Academy rises again, and it’s now up to the new graduates to define the future of the Federation.

action.name: I Feel Like Anything is Possible

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!
